title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should save the relative path.
OB: The BIRT designer does not generate the relative path and does not save the relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate the relative path and save the relative path.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open BIRT designer.
2. Create a new report design under $project/test.
3. Include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
4. Check the path of the included library.
